701682f-a.text:
Randall Ave. (foreground), at Casanova Street. The view is in the Northwesterly direction, showing, in the background, part of the more populated lower Bronx. The two bridges in the distance, cross the tracks of the New York, New Have, and Hartford Railroad.

Keystone View Co. Inc. of New York.   About 1918.
701682f-a.folder: Randall Avenue & Casanova Street, Bronx, NY
